A proclamation for apprehending James Duke of Buccleugh, and other traiterous conspirators against the life of the King, and His Royal Highness, and for subversion of the government England and Wales. Sovereign (1660-1685 : Charles II) Charles II, King of England, 1630-1685.
1 sheet ([1] p.)
Printed by the heir of Andrew Anderson, printer to His Most Sacred Majesty ; by George-Croom ..., Edinburgh : Re-printed at London : 1683.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
